title: Adventures In Tomorrow
description: An anthology of stories edited by Kendell Foster CrossenContents: Flying Dutchman by Ward MooreThere Will Come Soft Rains by Ray BradburyThe Mute Question by Forrest J. AckermanThe Portable Phonograph by Walter Van Tilburg ClarkAutomaton by A. E. van VogtRestricted Clientele by Kendell Foster CrossenShambleau by C. L. MooreChristmas on Ganymede by Isaac AsimovMemory by Theodore SturgeonExiled from Earth by Sam MerwinRetreat to the Stars by Leigh BrackettThe Voice of the Lobster by Henry KuttnerEvolution's End by Robert ArthurTransfer Point by Anthony BoucherThe Devil Was Sick by Bruce Elliott.
author: Kendell Foster Crossen
